New typefaces! GOTHAM and GOTHAM CONDENSED   
   
 I'm delighted to introduce the first of many new typefaces   
 designed exclusively for The Hoefler Type Foundry by Tobias   
 Frere-Jones:   
   
 [http://www.typography.com/catalog/gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014254/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/gotham)   
   
 A native New Yorker, Tobias celebrates his return to the city   
 with GOTHAM, a new family of sans serifs in regular and   
 condensed. Gotham takes both its name and its inspiration   
 from a type of public lettering common to New York -- these   
 are the plainspoken alphabets of shop windows and billboards,   
 rendered in paint, plaster, neon, glass and steel, which every   
 designer has admired at one time or another.
